ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: well you should ALL submit a bug report about it next time you are playing . .  . ... From: John Penman  To:
ygData.messageBody:
well you should ALL submit a bug report about it next time you are playing .
. .

----- Original Message -----
From: John Penman <jpenman@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 12:16 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES


> From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
>
> My friends see me wearing a blue robe as well but in fact I am in Red. I
> have seen screenshots of this as well.
>
> Shadair
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 11:00 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES
>
>
> > From: Keith Wiseman <keithw@...>
> >
> > Well....
> > I'm an Erudite Wizard, bought my Red robe in our guild there.
> > My Erudite Magician friend, bought his 'Blue' robe in his guild there.
> >
> > Weird thing is... He sees me as wearing a Blue robe and himself wearing
a
> > Red robe (with screenshots to prove it). We also have a necro friend
> that
> > I see as wearing a Brown robe and he sees as wearing Green one!!!
> Anyone
> > else heard of this????
> >
> > Draco, 14th Wiz on Veeshan
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: McGraw, T. David [mailto:Mcgraw.Thomas@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 9:25 AM
> > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES
> >
> > From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
> >
> > Here is my rundown of known robe colors....
> >
> > Freeport - Violet Robes
> > Felwithe - Green Robes
> > Neriak - Black Robes
> > Ak'anon - Yellow Robes
> > Qeynos - Blue Robes
> > Befallen 3rd Level - Gossamer Robes(white)
> > Erudin - I believe it is Red but I can't be sure.
> >
> > Any other additions would be appreciated.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Larimus La'shain
> > [mailto:larimus@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:11 AM
> > To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES
> >
> > From: "Larimus La'shain"
> > <larimus@...>
> >
> > You'll find the red robe in the Tower of the
> > Crimson Hands
> > inside the
> > Erudin Palace.
> >
> > Larimus La'shain
> >
> >
> > >From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
> > >Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> > >To: "EQ WIZARDS" <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> > >Subject: [eq_wizards] ROBES
> > >Date: Wed, 21 Apr 1999 10:01:20 -0400
> > >
> > >I know people already talked about the
> > clothing thing, but
> > can
> > someone give a breakdown of what color robes
> > can be found
> > where??
> > >
> > >SO far all I know is:
> > >
> > >Felwithe (high elf city in Greater F.)
> > GREEN ROBE (Sr.
> > Apprentice
> > Robe too)
> > >Gnome city in Steamfont??? YELLOW ROBE
> > (Sr. version?)
> > >
> > >I was specifically looking for a RED ROBE
> > or BLACK ROBE . .
> > .
> > >
> > >Thanks!!!
> > >
> > >-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
> >
> >
